modName: (Bible Black) Custom Voice Follower Kitami Reika
summary: Follower Kitami Reika from Bible Black.. Version 2.0 (Still not in final version, Try at your own risk).
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][/center][center][img]http://78.media.tumblr.com/2adaf5c5d3adaf25b2ff94d5ae8cbfb8/tumblr_p6fnfcTnYv1vd3is0o1_1280.jpg[/img]﻿

- - - FOLLOWER INFO - - - 
 
Name: Kitami Reika
Race: Nord
Voice type: Custom
Body: UNPB
Weight: 1.0
Height: 1.0
Class: Combat mage Destruction
Marriageable: No
Essential: No
Location: Markarth, Dibella's Temple.
 
 - - - REQUIREMENTS - - - 
 
Skyrim v1.9.32.0.8 or higher
SKSE Latest version
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213]HDT HighHeels System[/url]﻿ and[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/] HDT Physics Extensions[/url]﻿ by HydrogensaysHDT


 - - - WHAT"S NEW IN VERSION 2.0 - - - 

- Custom Voice
- Fixed textures path for the head
- HDT hair and Earrings
- Improved Combat
- No essential
- No marriageable
- HDT vagina version



[b][color=#980000][size=3]WARNING:
[/size][/color][/b]Some of the lines said by this follower are a bit explicit
and could be not of the liking of some people. 


 - - -INSTALL - - - 

1. Install using Mod Organizer (Highly recommended).
2. If you are updating: Uninstall previous version completely and then install newest version. 


[color=#980000][size=4]NOTES:
[/size][/color] 1- - The first time you go meet her, she'll be naked. You need to trade her something and she will equip her armor.

2- - If she is not talking or showing dialogue options, save in front of her and reload that save. (This is a bug that happens with custom voiced followers).

3 - - If the follower gets decapitated while wearing the Hair wig and earrings, it will result in CTD, be wary.

4 - - To fix her boots digging into the ground, you need to grab the boots from her inventory, equip then yourself (in case your char is female) and apply HDT high heels to them. After that, give the boots back to Kitami.
 


 - - - CREDITS - - -
